results.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic punishes keeper Lee Camp's error as Fulham win at Birmingham City in the Championship.

results.description: Garry Monk says his values will always be key as he looks to return to the Premier League with Sheffield Wednesday.

results.description: Birmingham City sign French striker Jeremie Bela following a contract row with his previous club, Spanish side Albacete.

thumbnail.altText: France-born Jeremie Bela is qualified to play for Angola and was called up for their pre-tournament squad ahead of this summers Africa Cup of Nations

results.title: Cardiff City 4-2 Birmingham City: Joe Ralls hat-trick inspires Bluebirds

results.description: Watch highlights as Birmingham City score a goal in each half to earn their first points of the season to beat Liverpool and send the 2013 Women's Super League champions to the bottom of the table.

results.description: Detectives are urging football fans with phone footage of the violence to share it with them.
